attributes.additional_details: The government/parliament should give a  three day holiday on eid, I strongly feel this should be discussed in parliament as there are holidays for Easter and Christmas yet none for eid even though around 24% of people are Muslim and celebrate eid.
attributes.background: I would like for there to be a 3 day holiday in eid as I understand the date changes each year 3 days would be more than enough to celebrate the festivities.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561805
